itemDisplayName: Deploy a simple VM (Linux or Windows) with Web Server (Apache or IIS) and iperf3 components behind a Virtual Machine acting as NAT gateaway and with port forwarding
description: This template allows you to deploy a simple VM (Linux or Windows) with Web Server (Apache or IIS) and iperf3 components behind a Virtual Machine acting as NAT gateaway and with port forwarding
summary: This template takes a minimum amount of parameters and deploys a VM (Linux or Windows) , using the latest patched version, behind a Virtual Machine acting as NAT gateaway and with port forwarding
